When rolling 100d6, the expected total is $\text{ET}=350$ with a standard error of $\text{SE}=17$. When rolling $n=100$ of the  3d-printed dice, our class rolled a total of $\sum x =448$. Calculate a $z$-score. $$z = \frac{\sum x - \text{ET}}{\text{SE}} $$
